Trade/Device Name(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System Wiz
Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System Wiz Plus
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Meter Wiz Plus
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bionime Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System Wiz and Wiz Plus for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home, measuring glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
